reply.label: Reply
reply.text: Bot will send commands responses as reply

deleteConfirmation.text: Are you sure you want delete this thing?

haveNoAccess.message: You are not authorized to view this page, ask broadcaster to provide it.

validations.startsWith: Command name should not start with !
validations.len: Command name should be less than 25 characters

validations.empty: Response should not be empty. Command can be created without responses, so you can omit this field.
validations.len: Response should be less than 500 characters

responses.defaultWarning: Responses cannot be edited for default commands

permissions.name: Roles
permissions.placeholder: Select roles, which will have permissions to use commands
permissions.deniedUsers: Users, who cannot use that command
permissions.allowedUsers: Users, who can bypass roles restriction for that command

restrictions.name: Restrictions by stats
restrictions.watchTime: Required watch time for use that command
restrictions.messages: Required messages for use that command
restrictions.channelsPoints: Required used channels points for use that command

visible.label: Visibility
visible.text: Command visibility in public page, in commands list variable.

keepOrder.label: Keep order of responses
keepOrder.text: Bot will keep your order of respones when they sent in chat

onlineOnly.label: Online only
onlineOnly.text: Command will work only when stream online

botManage.title: Bot manage
botManage.notModerator: We have found that the bot is not a moderator on this channel. Please, use /mod {botName}, or some of functionality may work incorrectly.

obs.warningTitle: You have to configure obs first
obs.warningText: Seems like you not connected Twir with obs, please do it on overlays page.

overlays.noAccess: You cannot copy overlays of other users
overlays.copied: Copied link url, paste it in obs as browser source

tts.description: Play audios in your OBS with some set of preconfigured voices. You can use that overlay via commands, or on events
tts.eventsHint: Hint: you can use events system to trigger tts on reward.
tts.allowUsersChooseVoice: Allow users use different voices in main (!tts) command
tts.doNotReadTwitchEmotes: Do not read Twitch emotes, including 7tv, FFZ, BTTV
tts.readChatMessages: Read all chat messages in overlay
tts.readChatMessagesNicknames: Read nicknames when reading chat messages
tts.disallowedVoices: Disallowed voices for usages in !tts voice command

users.empty: No one's created their own customizations yet.

obs.description: This overlay used for connect Twir with your obs. It gives opportunity to bot manage your sources, scenes, audio sources on events.

player.title: Current song
player.noAccess: Player available only on your dashboard, you cannot listen songs requests on other users dashboards

settings.onlineOnly: Accept requests only when stream online
settings.neededPercentageForskip: Needed percentage of online users to skip song

users.minimalWatchTime: Minimal watch time for request song (minutes)
users.minimalMessages: Minimal mininal messages for requesting song
users.minimalFollowTime: Minimal follow time for request song (minutes)

songs.maxRequests: Maximum number of songs in queue
songs.minLength: Min length of song for request (minutes)
songs.maxLength: Max length of song for request (minutes)
songs.minViews: Minimal views on song for request

modal.timelineDescription: One response will be sent once every N intervals, example:

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.regularDescription: Regular expression should be written for golang!

variables.title: Variables
variables.info: When you create variable, then you can use them in bot responses.

info.title: Greeting system used for welcoming new users typed their first message on stream.
info.text: If you wanna greet every user in chat, not only specified - then you can use events system.
